programme.desc: Joku šovs, kurā slaveni britu komiķi veic ārkārtīgi dīvainus uzdevumus un tāskmāsters Gregs Deiviss tos pienācīgi novērtē. Sagadījies tā, ka Grega palīgs Alekss Horns ir apveltīts ne tikai ar bezgalīgu uzticību, bet arī dīvainībām pilnu prātu. Divpadsmitajā sezonā Alekss tāskmāstera uzdevumā izaicinās komiķus gan uzmeistarot tiltiņu no smiltīm, gan uzmest gludekli uz gludināmā dēļa no maksimāli tālākās distances, gan dabūt pamatīgu zosādu.

programme.title: Simpsoni 14
programme.desc: “Simpsoni” iekļuvuši “Ginesa rekordu” grāmatā kā visilgāk demonstrētais animācijas seriāls pasaulē un seriāls, kurā piedalījies visvairāk slavenību. Patlaban tiek uzņemta jau sešpadsmitā “Simpsonu” sezona. Plānots, ka seriāla uzņemšanu pārtrauks pēc trim gadiem, pēdējo sēriju nofilmējot 2008.gadā, kad uz kino ekrāniem iznāks pirmā “Simpsonu” pilnmetrāžas filma.Savas pastāvēšanas laikā seriāls vairākkārt ieguvis prestižas godalgas, tai skaitā jau 18 “Emmy” balvas. Homēra mīļākais teiciens “D’oh!” ir kļuvis par popkultūras ikonu un 2001.gadā iekļauts Oksfordas vārdnīcā. 2003.gada 16.februārī seriāla 300.sērijas “dzimšanas dienā” Simpsoni tika pie savas zvaigznes Holivudas Slavas alejā!

programme.title: Simpsoni 15
programme.desc: Šosezon “Simpsonu” nezaudē sev tik raksturīgās vērtības - inteliģento scenāriju, apburošās asprātības un savdabīgu humoru. Piecpadsmitajā sezonā “Simpsonos” viesosies tādi pazīstami cilvēki kā Lielbritānijas premjers Tonijs Blērs, aktrises Glena Klouza un Dženifera Gārnere, kā arī “Harija Potera” autore Dž.K.Roulinga un daudzi citi.

programme.title: Īpašo uzdevumu vienība Hawaii 5-0 3
programme.desc: Īpašo uzdevumu vienība Hawaii 5-0 atgriežas, lai turpinātu izmeklēt slepkavības, terorismu un cilvēku tirdzniecības gadījumus. Trešā sezona atsākas tieši no otrās sezonas noslēdzošajiem traģiskajiem notikumiem, kad tika nogalināt komandieris Fraijers, ievainots Makss, uzspridzināta visa policijas ēka, bet Činam nāca izvēlēties, kuru no sev tuviem cilvēkiem glābt – māsīcu vai sievu. Skatītājs tika atstāts neziņā par to, vai Kono ir izdzīvojusi, bet Makgarets beidzot satiek Šelbērnu. Visi šie notikumi vienību kā nekad agrāk ir noskaņo notvert Vo Fetu un Delano, lai sodītu par nodarīto. Seriāls nominēts prestižajām Zelta globusa un Emmy balvām.

programme.title: Austrālijas zelta meklētāji 6
programme.desc: Laipni lūgti lielākajās zelta medībās uz zemes! Zelta drudža pārņemtas komandas dodas šī dārgmetāla medībās, neļaujot Austrālijas tuksneša tveicei, čūskām vai neveiksmēm tās apturēt. Šajā sezonā zelta cena ir īpaši augsta, un septiņas zelta meklētāju komandas ir pilnas optimisma. Pieredzējušie "Smilšu velni" mērķē uz 14,2 kilogramiem zelta – vairāk nekā miljona dolāru vērtībā! Jaunpienācēji "Mežoņi" šosezon plāno atrast 850 gramus zelta. "Poseidona" komanda vēlas atkārtot pērnās sezonas panākumus un tīko pēc 5,6 kilogramiem zelta. Markuss un Lindens sapņo par 420 gramiem. Zelta drudzis skāris arī Robu un Turbo, taču abu mērķis šosezon ir pieticīgs – 430 grami. Bet draugi Šeins un Rasels plāno sasniegt 700 gramu mērķi.

programme.title: Noliktavu kari 3
programme.desc: Kalifornijā, ASV ir tāds likums – ja par mantu glabātuvi netiek maksāts trīs mēnešus, noliktavas īpašnieks tā saturu drīkst izpārdot izsolē. Viss saturs tiek pārdots kā viena vienība un atļauta ir izsole tikai skaidrā naudā. Šovs seko vairākiem šādu izsoļu dalībniekiem, kur ar to nodarbojas profesionāli. Pirms katras izsoles tiek atvērta mantu glabātuve, un potenciālie pircēji piecas minūtes var aplūkot to saturu, taču viņi nedrīkst iet iekšā, lai apskatītos tuvāk, vai glabātuvē esošajās mantās ir kas vērtīgs. Kad izsole ir galā, uzvarētājs izpēta, ko tieši ir iegādājies un ar ekspertu palīdzību nosaka katras lietas vērtību, lai saprastu – šis pirkums ir nesis peļņu vai zaudējumus un cik lielus.

programme.title: Noliktavu kari 3
programme.desc: Kalifornijā, ASV ir tāds likums – ja par mantu glabātuvi netiek maksāts trīs mēnešus, noliktavas īpašnieks tā saturu drīkst izpārdot izsolē. Viss saturs tiek pārdots kā viena vienība un atļauta ir izsole tikai skaidrā naudā. Šovs seko vairākiem šādu izsoļu dalībniekiem, kur ar to nodarbojas profesionāli. Pirms katras izsoles tiek atvērta mantu glabātuve, un potenciālie pircēji piecas minūtes var aplūkot to saturu, taču viņi nedrīkst iet iekšā, lai apskatītos tuvāk, vai glabātuvē esošajās mantās ir kas vērtīgs. Kad izsole ir galā, uzvarētājs izpēta, ko tieši ir iegādājies un ar ekspertu palīdzību nosaka katras lietas vērtību, lai saprastu – šis pirkums ir nesis peļņu vai zaudējumus un cik lielus.

programme.title: Kalnieši. Dzīve augstienē 8
programme.desc: No nelīdzenajiem Ziemeļkarolīnas kalniem līdz skarbajai Montānai un saltajam Aļaskas ziemeļu lokam – šeit ir augstienes, ko drosmīgi vīri un sievas dēvē par savu mājvietu. Šo ļaužu mitekļos nav mūsdienu ērtību, viņi pavada dienas Amerikas nelīdzenajos kalnos, cīnoties ar izsalkušiem savvaļas zvēriem, dubļu nogruvumiem, vētrām un krītošiem kokiem, lai sagādātu sev visu, kas nepieciešams izdzīvošanai. Iestājoties ziemai, Morgans un Mārgareta lidos uz ziemeļiem, lai sagādātu iztiku. Tikmēr Mārtijs gatavos slazdus, Džeiks dzīs pēdas plēsējiem, bet Jūstass nolīgs mācekli.

programme.title: Pasaules karš Z
programme.desc: Pandēmija pārņem valsti pēc valsts, kontinentu pēc kontinenta. Bojā iet tūkstošiem kareivju Krievijā, Eiropā, Āzijā un ASV. Zeme atrodas uz globālas katastrofas sliekšņa. Apvienoto Nāciju darbinieks Džerijs Leins cenšas atrast veidu, kā apturēt tuvojošos apokalipsi. Pagaidām nevienam nav zināms, kā tikt galā ar ienaidnieku, kurš jau ir miris...

programme.title: Juras laikmeta parks 3
programme.desc: Notikumi kļūst nekontrolējami, kad slavenais paleontologs Dr. Alans Grānts piekrīt pavadīt bagāto piedzīvojumu kāro Polu Kērbiju un viņa sievu eksotiskā un bīstamā ceļojumā. Kad viņu lidmašīnai nākas veikt piespiedu nosēšanos, atklājas, ka Kērbijiem ir pavisam citi motīvi šim ceļojumam kā piedzīvojumu meklēšana – viņi patiesībā vēlas atrast savu pazudušo dēlu. Taču nu viņi ir iesprostoti uz salas, kuru apdzīvo ne visai draudzīgi noskaņotas radības.

programme.title: Inspektors Dipēns 6
programme.desc: Vasara Bretaņā – gada skaistākais laiks. Diemžēl ne inspektoram Dipēnam. Tiesa, pēc ilgiem laikiem viņš dodas atvaļinājumā kopā ar savu draudzeni Klēru, taču, izrādās, atpūta viņam ir svešs jēdziens. Nespējot rast mieru, inspektors dodas pastaigā gar jūru un kļūst par liecinieku sievietes pašnāvībai. Sievietes vīrs ir izmisumā un nespēj izskaidrot sievas pašnāvību. Taču tad mīklainos apstākļos mirst vēl kāda sieviete. Vai tiešām tikai sagadīšanās? Dipēns domā, ka notikumi ir savstarpēji saistīti, un nekavējas sākt notikušo izmeklēt.

programme.title: Gigantiskās pagaidu būves
programme.desc: Bez brīdinājuma tās uzrodas vien dažu nedēļu laikā, dažreiz pat dažu stundu laikā. Gigantiskās būves var tapt vien pateicoties precīzai plānošanai, perfektam komandas darbam un līdz sīkākajai detaļai noorganizētām diennakts maiņām. Šiem būvniekiem ir tikai viens ienaidnieks: laiks. Dzelzceļa pāreja Indijā, milzu peldbaseins sacensībām Lasvegasā, sniega festivāls Japānā – vai būvniekiem izdosies pagūt laikus izveidot milzīgās būves, vai arī apstākļi apgrūtinās viņu plānus un piespiedīs padoties?

programme.title: Tāskmāsters 12
programme.desc: Joku šovs, kurā slaveni britu komiķi veic ārkārtīgi dīvainus uzdevumus un tāskmāsters Gregs Deiviss tos pienācīgi novērtē. Sagadījies tā, ka Grega palīgs Alekss Horns ir apveltīts ne tikai ar bezgalīgu uzticību, bet arī dīvainībām pilnu prātu. Divpadsmitajā sezonā Alekss tāskmāstera uzdevumā izaicinās komiķus gan uzmeistarot tiltiņu no smiltīm, gan uzmest gludekli uz gludināmā dēļa no maksimāli tālākās distances, gan dabūt pamatīgu zosādu.

programme.title: Real Life of a Roman Soldier
programme.sub-title: Recent excavations in the city of Lyon shed light on the daily lives of Roman soldiers; numerous artefacts have been unearthed such as 1st-century A.D. / C.E. weapons and toiletry and leisure items.
programme.desc: Recent excavations in England and France have shed new light on the real day-to-day lives of Roman soldiers, uncovering the truth of the living men behind the legendary figures.

programme.title: World War II: The End
programme.sub-title: The Western and Soviet Allied forces meet at Torgau on the Elbe river; the Western troops, having landed at D-Day, descend on Germany from the West while the Soviets march from the East.
programme.desc: Chart the final months of World War II, including the Wehrmachts last-ditch battles on the Western and Eastern Fronts, and recount the mounting horrors that preceded the joy of VE and VJ Day.

programme.title: Adolf Hitler: Decoding A Dictator
programme.sub-title: To determine how Der Fuhrers secrets may have shaped the man behind the tyrant, we need to examine his troubled childhood and sociopathic personality.
programme.desc: This series explores six distinctive aspects of the life and rule of Adolf Hitler and questions how a 30-year-old uneducated nobody was able to leave a legacy of unprecedented evil.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Science
programme.sub-title: WWII was a war in the skies; though the Treaty of Versailles had prevented the Germans from developing new weapons, they sponsored air clubs and pushed for supremacy in the air.
programme.desc: When the Nazi empire collapsed at the end of WWII, the darkest secrets of the Third Reich came to light; this series exposes everything from biological experiments to supersize feats of engineering.

programme.title: Cursed Treasures
programme.sub-title: An Indian jewel at the time of the Mughal Empire is linked to centuries of greed and bloodshed, and a fatal road trip in 1950s Los Angeles extinguishes one of Hollywoods brightest stars.
programme.desc: Leading experts in their field try to unravel the mystery behind fascinating and doomed objects including Tutankhamuns tomb, the Terracotta Army, the Hope Diamond and the Amber Room.

programme.title: Treasures with Bettany Hughes
programme.sub-title: Returning to Oman, Bettany follows clues to the world of the Desert Lord - the stunning desert - and meets modern Bedu who are descendants of his traditions.
programme.desc: Professor Bettany Hughes travels across the world to investigate the story of humanity; making new discoveries along the way, she lifts the lid on the most remarkable treasures of civilisation.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: Thousands of people were dosed with LSD by the CIA; did the CIA murder its own people, poison a whole French town, experiment on New Yorkers and assassinate Bobby Kennedy?
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: J. Paul Getty was renowned for his wealth and frugality as well as his lack of empathy and compassion for his family. He would marry four times and sire five sons, but he died old and alone.
programme.desc: From royal families spanning centuries to billionaire business tycoons and their clans, Cursed Bloodlines examines real-life historical instances of tragically ill-fated bloodlines.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: The Grimaldi family has held their posts as sovereigns of Monaco with the utmost grace, but one thing they have missed time and again is good luck in the love department.
programme.desc: From royal families spanning centuries to billionaire business tycoons and their clans, Cursed Bloodlines examines real-life historical instances of tragically ill-fated bloodlines.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: The location of King Solomons Mines has been a mystery for hundreds of years; new evidence has led to an amazing discovery. Might Solomons wealth have come from the copper mines of southern Israel?
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Adolf Hitler: Decoding A Dictator
programme.sub-title: To determine how Der Fuhrers secrets may have shaped the man behind the tyrant, we need to examine his troubled childhood and sociopathic personality.
programme.desc: This series explores six distinctive aspects of the life and rule of Adolf Hitler and questions how a 30-year-old uneducated nobody was able to leave a legacy of unprecedented evil.

programme.title: World War II: The End
programme.sub-title: The Western and Soviet Allied forces meet at Torgau on the Elbe river; the Western troops, having landed at D-Day, descend on Germany from the West while the Soviets march from the East.
programme.desc: Chart the final months of World War II, including the Wehrmachts last-ditch battles on the Western and Eastern Fronts, and recount the mounting horrors that preceded the joy of VE and VJ Day.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Science
programme.sub-title: WWII was a war in the skies; though the Treaty of Versailles had prevented the Germans from developing new weapons, they sponsored air clubs and pushed for supremacy in the air.
programme.desc: When the Nazi empire collapsed at the end of WWII, the darkest secrets of the Third Reich came to light; this series exposes everything from biological experiments to supersize feats of engineering.

programme.title: Emperor: The Rise and Fall of a Dynasty
programme.sub-title: Livia, the first empress of Rome, came to regret the scheming that put her son Tiberius on the throne as he and his heir Caligula dragged the empire into an age of tyranny and shocking depravity.
programme.desc: Delve into the most tumultuous era in Roman history with the stories of the first five emperors - and the powerful women behind them - told through the eyes of Livia, the matriarch of the Caesar clan.

programme.title: Real Life of a Roman Soldier
programme.sub-title: Two sites are emblematic of legionary life in Ancient Roman times: the fort of Vindolanda and the garrison of Lugdunum. Excavations have unearthed objects that shed light on the life of these sites.
programme.desc: Recent excavations in England and France have shed new light on the real day-to-day lives of Roman soldiers, uncovering the truth of the living men behind the legendary figures.

programme.title: Pompeii: The New Dig
programme.sub-title: A new excavation at Pompeii continues to unearth rich discoveries while a pioneering new investigation finds evidence that some Pompeiians survived the eruption of A.D. / C.E. 79.
programme.desc: We follow the biggest excavation of Pompeii in a generation; with access to the archaeological and forensic investigation, we also discover what happened to named survivors and find their descendants.

programme.title: Why Planes Vanish: The Mystery of Flight MH370
programme.desc: Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370 disappeared with 239 passengers and crew on board on the 8th of March, 2014; this documentary looks at if new radio technology could help locate the missing aircraft.

programme.title: Lost Pyramids of the Aztecs
programme.sub-title: In this episode, archaeologists begin a pioneering experiment to build a replica Aztec pyramid and investigate the mysterious pyramid ruins being unearthed in the heart of Mexico City.
programme.desc: Using CGI, unique access to new excavations, and a pioneering experiment, archaeologists are digging deeper than ever before to find out who the Aztecs were and how they built their remarkable empire.

programme.title: Lost Pyramids of the Aztecs
programme.sub-title: Archaeologists investigate the discovery of over 100 ancient skeletons buried in a hillside outside Mexico City and manage to complete their experiment to build a replica Aztec pyramid.
programme.desc: Using CGI, unique access to new excavations, and a pioneering experiment, archaeologists are digging deeper than ever before to find out who the Aztecs were and how they built their remarkable empire.

programme.title: Conquistadors: The Rise and Fall
programme.sub-title: The ruthlessly ambitious Hernán Cortes travels deep into the Mexican interior to conquer the Aztecs, one of the greatest empires in the Americas.
programme.desc: Popular culture has painted the Conquistadors as brave Christian pioneers, but a shifting narrative has revealed a darker story to their rise and fall.

programme.title: Conquistadors: The Rise and Fall
programme.sub-title: Following the success of Hernán Cortes over the Aztecs, conquistador Francisco Pizarro sets his sights on conquering the Incas, the largest civilisation in the Americas.
programme.desc: Popular culture has painted the Conquistadors as brave Christian pioneers, but a shifting narrative has revealed a darker story to their rise and fall.

programme.title: The Frontier
programme.sub-title: Mexican-owned Texas offers freedom for white settlers, but the influx of Americans would be the catalyst for the Mexican-American war that would change the course of US history forever.
programme.desc: This series explores the legends, events and folklore of the American frontier, a place that has become part of one of the defining periods of American national identity.

programme.title: The Frontier
programme.sub-title: The territory of California proves invaluable as the discovery of gold unleashes the largest migration in US history and ignites a debate on slavery that culminates in the American Civil War.
programme.desc: This series explores the legends, events and folklore of the American frontier, a place that has become part of one of the defining periods of American national identity.

programme.title: Pompeii: The New Dig
programme.sub-title: The excavation of a wealthy villa, bakery and laundry in Pompeii reaches its climax with chilling revelations about what people were doing in the final terrifying hours in A.D. / C.E. 79.
programme.desc: We follow the biggest excavation of Pompeii in a generation; with access to the archaeological and forensic investigation, we also discover what happened to named survivors and find their descendants.

programme.title: Emperor: The Rise and Fall of a Dynasty
programme.sub-title: Claudius rose to the throne but was poisoned by his wife; after his successor Nero alienated Rome, Livia Drusillas dynasty ended with brutal power struggles but having changed the course of history.
programme.desc: Delve into the most tumultuous era in Roman history with the stories of the first five emperors - and the powerful women behind them - told through the eyes of Livia, the matriarch of the Caesar clan.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.sub-title: The Nazis spent the war pillaging museums, emptying coffers, and stealing everything of value; with so much still missing, where did the Nazis hide their stolen hoards?
programme.desc: The collapse of the Third Reich left as many secrets as it did relics; remnants of the Nazis schemes still lie concealed in structures scattered across the globe today.

programme.title: War Factories
programme.sub-title: While America had Ford, Chrysler and Buick, Hitler also wanted a car that would transform his nation - the peoples car, or Volkswagen.
programme.desc: No matter how many soldiers you have, how clever your generals or how daring your strategy, you will not win a war if you dont have enough bullets, planes, or food. WW2 was a war of the factories...

programme.title: Secret Weapons: WWII
programme.sub-title: World War II ignited a fierce battle for aerial dominance and drove nations to pioneer secret aircraft technologies; this episode explores the development of early jet fighters.
programme.desc: This series highlights how WWII fuelled technological leaps leading to jet planes and space rockets; each episode delves into different weapon categories and offers insights into wartime engineering.

programme.title: Hitlers Power
programme.sub-title: Hitler had outwardly emphasised his will for peace, yet he committed his top commanders once he came to power to a war of extermination that would secure the German Reichs supremacy in Europe.
programme.desc: What led the Germans to support the Holocaust? This three-part series takes a closer look at the relationship between dictator Adolf Hitler and the German people.

programme.title: World War II: The End
programme.sub-title: Hitler retreats into his bunker as the Allies advance on Nazi Germany; the Fuhrer issues frantic orders to non-existent armies as he loses his grip on reality.
programme.desc: Chart the final months of World War II, including the Wehrmachts last-ditch battles on the Western and Eastern Fronts, and recount the mounting horrors that preceded the joy of VE and VJ Day.

programme.title: Cursed Treasures
programme.sub-title: The onset of a violent storm in Staffordshire in England announced the discovery of the largest Anglo-Saxon hoard ever uncovered, but was the storm an omen of things to come?
programme.desc: Leading experts in their field try to unravel the mystery behind fascinating and doomed objects including Tutankhamuns tomb, the Terracotta Army, the Hope Diamond and the Amber Room.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: What happened to Mary Magdalene after the resurrection of Jesus? We follow history enthusiasts in southern France on their quest to find the remains of the saint in a place no-one has searched before.
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: The location of King Solomons Mines has been a mystery for hundreds of years; new evidence has led to an amazing discovery. Might Solomons wealth have come from the copper mines of southern Israel?
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: What happened to Mary Magdalene after the resurrection of Jesus? We follow history enthusiasts in southern France on their quest to find the remains of the saint in a place no-one has searched before.
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Mummies Unwrapped
programme.sub-title: Could an exhibit from an oddities museum in Niagara Falls be a genuine long-lost pharaoh from Egypts most iconic dynasty? A team of leading Egyptologists and scientists re-examine the evidence.
programme.desc: Come on a journey to some of the greatest mysteries of the ancient Egyptian world to discover the remarkable secrets behind unmarked sarcophagi, unusual burials, horribly disfigured mummies and more.

programme.title: Treasures with Bettany Hughes
programme.sub-title: Returning to Oman, Bettany follows clues to the world of the Desert Lord - the stunning desert - and meets modern Bedu who are descendants of his traditions.
programme.desc: Professor Bettany Hughes travels across the world to investigate the story of humanity; making new discoveries along the way, she lifts the lid on the most remarkable treasures of civilisation.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.sub-title: A 5,000-year-old carved stone object is artfully shaped into four lobes covered in unique markings; who made it, and why did people believe that an electrocution device could cure people?
programme.desc: Hidden away in museums, laboratories, and storage rooms around the world are the most remarkable objects on Earth; using new research and technology, we get under their skin like never before.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.sub-title: The Nazis had all but lost the war by March of 1945, but Hitler still sent throngs of soldiers to protect an isolated area of occupied Poland from oncoming forces. What was he trying to hide?
programme.desc: The collapse of the Third Reich left as many secrets as it did relics; remnants of the Nazis schemes still lie concealed in structures scattered across the globe today.

programme.title: War Factories
programme.sub-title: Japan would create arguably the greatest fighter in WWII - the Mitsubishi Zero - but their failed war factories would ultimately reduce the Zero to a kamikaze plane.
programme.desc: No matter how many soldiers you have, how clever your generals or how daring your strategy, you will not win a war if you dont have enough bullets, planes, or food. WW2 was a war of the factories...

programme.title: Secret Weapons: WWII
programme.sub-title: World War II was a battle for supremacy at sea more than any other conflict before or since; in this episode, we explore how the secret weapons of naval warfare changed the tides of history.
programme.desc: This series highlights how WWII fuelled technological leaps leading to jet planes and space rockets; each episode delves into different weapon categories and offers insights into wartime engineering.

programme.title: Roman Megastructures
programme.sub-title: Using 3D imagery, reconstitutions and interviews with historians and archaeologists, this episode tells the story of Gallo-Roman Paris and uncovers the vestiges of ancient Paris: Lutetia.
programme.desc: We explore three cities that were once part of Julius Caesars quest to grow the Roman Empire; through the use of CGI and expert testimony, we unveil the secrets of these wonders of Roman engineering.

programme.title: Pompeii: The New Dig
programme.sub-title: The excavation of a wealthy villa, bakery and laundry in Pompeii reaches its climax with chilling revelations about what people were doing in the final terrifying hours in A.D. / C.E. 79.
programme.desc: We follow the biggest excavation of Pompeii in a generation; with access to the archaeological and forensic investigation, we also discover what happened to named survivors and find their descendants.

programme.title: Cursed Treasures
programme.sub-title: One of the greatest palaeontology discoveries ever is made in the Hell Creek Formation of South Dakota, but the find brought nothing but trouble and suspicion to those who uncovered it.
programme.desc: Leading experts in their field try to unravel the mystery behind fascinating and doomed objects including Tutankhamuns tomb, the Terracotta Army, the Hope Diamond and the Amber Room.
